configurableProperties.name: enabled
configurableProperties.description: Enable or disable the effects that occur when the window becomes unfocused.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: Enable or disable the effects that occur when the window becomes unfocused.

configurableProperties.name: shortTermUnfocusEffectFilter
configurableProperties.description: The CSS filter(s) which are applied to the window when the user initially unfocuses the application.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The CSS filter(s) which are applied to the window when the user initially unfocuses the application.

configurableProperties.name: shortTermUnfocusEffectTransitionDuration
configurableProperties.description: The duration of the transition from entirely in-focus to the fully unfocused state described by the `shortTermUnfocusEffectFilter` property, in seconds.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The duration of the transition from entirely in-focus to the fully unfocused state described by the `shortTermUnfocusEffectFilter` property, in seconds.

configurableProperties.name: longTermUnfocusEffectFilter
configurableProperties.default: blur(2.75px) grayscale(85%) sepia(5%) contrast(110%) brightness(95%) saturate(250%)
configurableProperties.description: The CSS filter(s) which are applied to the window when the user has been unfocused for a 'long' period of time, controlled by the `longTermUnfocusTransitionThreshold` property.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The CSS filter(s) which are applied to the window when the user has been unfocused for a 'long' period of time, controlled by the `longTermUnfocusTransitionThreshold` property.

configurableProperties.name: longTermUnfocusEffectTransitionDuration
configurableProperties.description: The duration of the transition from the 'short term' unfocused state described by the `shortTermUnfocusEffectFilter` property to the 'long term' unfocused state described by the `longTermUnfocusEffectFilter` property, in seconds.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The duration of the transition from the 'short term' unfocused state described by the `shortTermUnfocusEffectFilter` property to the 'long term' unfocused state described by the `longTermUnfocusEffectFilter` property, in seconds.

configurableProperties.name: windowRefocusEffectTransitionDuration
configurableProperties.description: The duration of the transition from either the short or long-term unfocused state to the fully in-focus state once the window is refocused, in seconds.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The duration of the transition from either the short **OR** long-term unfocused state to the fully **in-focus** state once the window is refocused, in **seconds**.

configurableProperties.name: longTermUnfocusTransitionThreshold
configurableProperties.description: There are two different types of unfocus effect: Short Term and Long Term - This is the number of seconds without focus which will make the window transition to its long-term unfocus effect.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: There are two different types of unfocus effect: **Short Term** and **Long Term** - This is the number of ***seconds*** without focus which will make the window transition to its *long-term* unfocus effect.
